description: This is an HTML source file that defines a web-based database visualizer interface including styles, layout, and client-side JavaScript logic for interacting with database API endpoints.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the backend API and updates the sidebar UI.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, updates UI accordingly, and resets current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expanding/collapsing a database node in the UI and loads its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table within a database.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Dynamically generates HTML for data table display, including headers and rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, long strings, and nulls distinctly.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content to show full or truncated data.
